summary: This is an FBI tip submission document (Case ID 50D-NY-3027571) detailing allegations from a victim of child sex trafficking. The victim describes being abused at locations in the UK, including a house near Thorpe Green and Frogmore Cottage, and at a mansion in Florida. The allegations implicate Prince Andrew, Ghislaine Maxwell, Jeffrey Epstein, and the victim's father in a pedophile ring operating between 1994-1996.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified by the victim as a man who sexually assaulted her, attempted to rape her, and took pornographic photographs of her at a mansion in Florida during a family vacation.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Allegedly hit the victim with his car at a house in the UK and later sexually assaulted her. The victim also states she saw his face during an incident of torture at Frogmore Cottage.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Allegedly tortured the victim with electrical shocks at Frogmore Cottage, beat her with a broom, and threatened her. The victim also mentions a text from Maxwell on her father's phone.

persons.name: Victim's Father
persons.context: Allegedly drugged and drove the victim to pedophile ring parties. The victim later reported him to police after seeing a text from Ghislaine Maxwell on his phone and believes he may have been involved in procurement for the ring.

persons.name: Victim's Mother
persons.context: Mentioned as working at a school where another alleged victim was sent.

connections.description: Both are accused by the victim of participating in the same pedophile ring and committing abuse against her.
Both are present during alleged abuse of the victim at Frogmore Cottage, with Maxwell conducting torture while the victim saw Andrew's face.
The victim saw a text from Maxwell on her father's phone, which triggered her to report him to police, suggesting communication between them.
The victim's father allegedly drove her to a location where she was later hit by Prince Andrew's car, placing them at the same alleged crime scene.

events.title: Alleged UK Abuse and Car Incident
events.description: The victim, aged 6-8, was drugged and driven by her father to pedophile ring parties at a house behind Thorpe Green, UK. She was hit by a car driven by Prince Andrew in the driveway, suffering permanent injuries. She was later sexually assaulted by Prince Andrew in the house.

events.title: Alleged Torture at Frogmore Cottage
events.description: The victim was taken to Frogmore Cottage, restrained on a table, and tortured with electrical shocks by Ghislaine Maxwell while surrounded by watching men, including Prince Andrew. Maxwell later beat her with a broom, breaking her nose.

events.title: Alleged Abuse in Florida
events.description: During a family vacation in Florida, the victim was driven by her father to a gated mansion with a rectangular pool. There, she was sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein, who also attempted to rape her and took pornographic photographs.

events.title: Victim Reports Father to Police
events.description: After seeing a text from Ghislaine Maxwell on her father's phone, the victim reported him to the police. The case was not investigated, and her father was able to destroy evidence.

events.title: Refurbishment of Frogmore Cottage
events.description: News coverage of Frogmore Cottage's refurbishment triggered the victim's recognition of it as a location where she was abused.

locations: House behind Thorpe Green, at the end of a private road, Surrey, UK (near Hurst Farm Livery Stables)
Frogmore Cottage, Windsor SL4 2JG, United Kingdom
Mansion with gated driveway and rectangular swimming pool in Florida (location unspecified)
House between Fanshaw Cottage and the Royal Marine Pub on Lyne Lane (GPS coordinates provided in document)
keyFacts: The victim alleges being hit by a car with a personalized license plate ending in 'DOY' driven by Prince Andrew, resulting in permanent injuries. The car's hood figurine broke off and was buried by the victim as potential evidence.
The victim provides specific GPS coordinates for an Irish Traveller community where she fled naked, suggesting potential witnesses who could corroborate events.
The victim alleges her father was involved in procurement for the pedophile ring, citing his visits to local schools and a disabled children's home (White Lodge Centre).

The document references another alleged female victim, a year younger than the submitter, who was present at some parties and later attended schools with the submitter, though they have never spoken about the events.
The victim states she is willing to testify and provide evidence, including detailed descriptions of events and the potential location of physical evidence (the car figurine).
